revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
bool '''CheckFor3DCeilingHit'''(double ''z'', bool ''trigger'')
== Usage == Checks if the Actor's head is currently hitting the bottom of a 3D sector.
=== Parameters === *''z'' - The z position to check at. This is not relative to the Actor. *''trigger'' - If true, trigger the sector action if it has one for hitting the ceiling.
=== Return value === Returns true if the Actor's head is hitting the bottom of a 3D sector at the specified z.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
